It screened to sold-out audiences at Tribeca, the American Film Festival in Los Angeles and the International Documentary Film Festival in Amsterdam. Simpson slams weight obsession The star dismissed speculation that she might join Simon Cowell on the judging panel of the upcoming Fox series. Simpson wrote on her Twitter page: Just to clear up a rumour... I am NOT going to judge X Factor!!! I don't even know where that info came from, ( sic ) . A string of high profile names have been linked to the show including Mariah Carey , Nicole Scherzinger and Cheryl Cole .
